function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of ventilation in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and air circulation","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with HEPA filters","People":"Occupants in indoor spaces","Owner":"Building managers, facility owners"},{"Description":"Overcrowding in public spaces","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Limiting the number of people allowed in public spaces, implementing crowd control measures","Technologies":"Smart occupancy monitoring systems, queue management systems","People":"General public, event attendees","Owner":"Public health authorities, event organizers"},{"Description":"Poor sanitation and hygiene practices","Impact":"Elevated risk of disease transmission through contaminated surfaces and objects","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, promoting hand hygiene","Technologies":"UV disinfection systems, touchless hand sanitizer dispensers","People":"Individuals using shared facilities","Owner":"Facility managers, cleaning staff"}]}
